text: José Said (17 April 1930 - 23 July 2020) was a Peruvian-born Chilean businessman. He was the founder and CEO of Parque Arauco S.A.. It is one of the largest real estate developers and operators of shopping malls in both Chile and Argentina. Said was born in Arequipa, Peru. Said died on 23 July 2020 in Santiago de Chile, aged 90.Fallece José Said, socio y presidente de Parque Arauco y Scotiabank Chile ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Peruvian businesspeople Category:Chilean businesspeople
title: José Said
